SELECT s.student_id, m.member_name, m.member_phone, m.birthday, m.member_email, c.curriculum_name, c.class_id, s.student_type, c.curriculum_end_at FROM student s JOIN member m ON s.student_id = m.member_id JOIN curriculum c ON s.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id
where ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' order by ${searchType}
